Adaptability.name: Adaptability
Adaptability.desc: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.

Aerilate.name: Aerilate
Aerilate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Flying type and have 1.3x power.

Aftermath.name: Aftermath
Aftermath.desc: If this Pokemon is KOed with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 its max HP.

Air Lock.name: Air Lock
Air Lock.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

Analytic.name: Analytic
Analytic.desc: This Pokemon's attacks have 1.3x power if it is the last to move in a turn.

Anger Point.name: Anger Point
Anger Point.desc: If this Pokemon (not its substitute) takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised 12 stages.

Anticipation.name: Anticipation
Anticipation.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move.

Arena Trap.name: Arena Trap
Arena Trap.desc: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne.

Aroma Veil.name: Aroma Veil
Aroma Veil.desc: Protects user/allies from Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment.

Aura Break.name: Aura Break
Aura Break.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the Dark Aura and Fairy Aura power modifier is 0.75x.

Bad Dreams.name: Bad Dreams
Bad Dreams.desc: Causes sleeping adjacent foes to lose 1/8 of their max HP at the end of each turn.

Battle Armor.name: Battle Armor
Battle Armor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

Big Pecks.name: Big Pecks
Big Pecks.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.

Blaze.name: Blaze
Blaze.desc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.

Bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
Bulletproof.desc: This Pokemon is immune to bullet moves.

Cheek Pouch.name: Cheek Pouch
Cheek Pouch.desc: If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its max HP after the Berry's effect.

Chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
Chlorophyll.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

Clear Body.name: Clear Body
Clear Body.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

Cloud Nine.name: Cloud Nine
Cloud Nine.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

Color Change.name: Color Change
Color Change.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of a move it's hit by, unless it has the type.

Competitive.name: Competitive
Competitive.desc: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.

Compound Eyes.name: Compound Eyes
Compound Eyes.desc: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

Contrary.name: Contrary
Contrary.desc: If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.

Cursed Body.name: Cursed Body
Cursed Body.desc: If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled.

Cute Charm.name: Cute Charm
Cute Charm.desc: 30% chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.

Damp.name: Damp
Damp.desc: Prevents Explosion/Self-Destruct/Aftermath while this Pokemon is active.

Dark Aura.name: Dark Aura
Dark Aura.desc: While this Pokemon is active, a Dark move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

Defeatist.name: Defeatist
Defeatist.desc: While this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its max HP, its Attack and Sp. Atk are halved.

Defiant.name: Defiant
Defiant.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.

Delta Stream.name: Delta Stream
Delta Stream.desc: On switch-in, strong winds begin until this Ability is not active in battle.

Desolate Land.name: Desolate Land
Desolate Land.desc: On switch-in, extremely harsh sunlight begins until this Ability is not active in battle.

Download.name: Download
Download.desc: On switch-in, Attack or Sp. Atk is raised 1 stage based on the foes' weaker Defense.

Drizzle.name: Drizzle
Drizzle.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

Drought.name: Drought
Drought.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

Dry Skin.name: Dry Skin
Dry Skin.desc: This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain; is hurt 1.25x by Fire, 1/8 by Sun.

Early Bird.name: Early Bird
Early Bird.desc: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

Effect Spore.name: Effect Spore
Effect Spore.desc: 30% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.

Fairy Aura.name: Fairy Aura
Fairy Aura.desc: While this Pokemon is active, a Fairy move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

Filter.name: Filter
Filter.desc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

Flame Body.name: Flame Body
Flame Body.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.

Flare Boost.name: Flare Boost
Flare Boost.desc: While this Pokemon is burned, its special attacks have 1.5x power.

Flash Fire.name: Flash Fire
Flash Fire.desc: This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.

Flower Gift.name: Flower Gift
Flower Gift.desc: If user is Cherrim and Sunny Day is active, it and allies' Attack and Sp. Def are 1.5x.

Flower Veil.name: Flower Veil
Flower Veil.desc: This side's Grass types can't have stats lowered or status inflicted by other Pokemon.

Forecast.name: Forecast
Forecast.desc: Castform's type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

Forewarn.name: Forewarn
Forewarn.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the foes' move with the highest power.

Friend Guard.name: Friend Guard
Friend Guard.desc: This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.

Frisk.name: Frisk
Frisk.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held items of all opposing Pokemon.

Gale Wings.name: Gale Wings
Gale Wings.desc: This Pokemon's Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

Gluttony.name: Gluttony
Gluttony.desc: This Pokemon eats Berries at 1/2 max HP or less instead of their usual 1/4 max HP.

Gooey.name: Gooey
Gooey.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.

Grass Pelt.name: Grass Pelt
Grass Pelt.desc: If Grassy Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

Guts.name: Guts
Guts.desc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.

Harvest.name: Harvest
Harvest.desc: If last item used is a Berry, 50% chance to restore it each end of turn. 100% in Sun.

Healer.name: Healer
Healer.desc: 30% chance each adjacent ally has its status cured at the end of each turn.

Heatproof.name: Heatproof
Heatproof.desc: The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved; burn damage halved.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.desc: This Pokemon has its status cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.

Hyper Cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
Hyper Cutter.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

Ice Body.name: Ice Body
Ice Body.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn; immunity to Hail.

Illusion.name: Illusion
Illusion.desc: This Pokemon appears as the last Pokemon in the party until it takes direct damage.

Immunity.name: Immunity
Immunity.desc: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

Imposter.name: Imposter
Imposter.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it.

Infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.desc: Moves ignore substitutes and the foe's Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, and Mist.

Inner Focus.name: Inner Focus
Inner Focus.desc: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.

Insomnia.name: Insomnia
Insomnia.desc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

Intimidate.name: Intimidate
Intimidate.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opponents by 1 stage.

Iron Barbs.name: Iron Barbs
Iron Barbs.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

Iron Fist.name: Iron Fist
Iron Fist.desc: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have 1.2x power. Sucker Punch is not boosted.

Justified.name: Justified
Justified.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.

Keen Eye.name: Keen Eye
Keen Eye.desc: This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.

Klutz.name: Klutz
Klutz.desc: This Pokemon's held item has no effect, except Macho Brace. Fling cannot be used.

Leaf Guard.name: Leaf Guard
Leaf Guard.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot be statused and Rest will fail for it.

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Smack Down/Iron Ball nullify it.

Lightning Rod.name: Lightning Rod
Lightning Rod.desc: This Pokemon draws Electric moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Electric immunity.

Limber.name: Limber
Limber.desc: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

Liquid Ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
Liquid Ooze.desc: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

Magic Bounce.name: Magic Bounce
Magic Bounce.desc: This Pokemon blocks certain Status moves and bounces them back to the user.

Magic Guard.name: Magic Guard
Magic Guard.desc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks.

Magician.name: Magician
Magician.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack.

Magma Armor.name: Magma Armor
Magma Armor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

Magnet Pull.name: Magnet Pull
Magnet Pull.desc: Prevents adjacent opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out.

Marvel Scale.name: Marvel Scale
Marvel Scale.desc: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

Mega Launcher.name: Mega Launcher
Mega Launcher.desc: This Pokemon's pulse moves have 1.5x power. Heal Pulse heals 3/4 target's max HP.

Minus.name: Minus
Minus.desc: If an active ally has this Ability or the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

Mold Breaker.name: Mold Breaker
Mold Breaker.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Moody.name: Moody
Moody.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 and lowers another stat by 1 at the end of each turn.

Motor Drive.name: Motor Drive
Motor Drive.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by an Electric move; Electric immunity.

Moxie.name: Moxie
Moxie.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.

Multiscale.name: Multiscale
Multiscale.desc: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.

Multitype.name: Multitype
Multitype.desc: If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate.

Mummy.name: Mummy
Mummy.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Mummy.

Natural Cure.name: Natural Cure
Natural Cure.desc: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.

No Guard.name: No Guard
No Guard.desc: Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.

Normalize.name: Normalize
Normalize.desc: This Pokemon's moves are changed to be Normal type.

Oblivious.name: Oblivious
Oblivious.desc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted.

Overcoat.name: Overcoat
Overcoat.desc: This Pokemon is immune to powder moves, Sandstorm or Hail damage, Effect Spore.

Overgrow.name: Overgrow
Overgrow.desc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Grass attacks.

Parental Bond.name: Parental Bond
Parental Bond.desc: This Pokemon's damaging moves hit twice. The second hit has its damage halved.

Pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
Pickpocket.desc: If this Pokemon has no item and is hit by a contact move, it steals the attacker's item.

Pickup.name: Pickup
Pickup.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it finds one used by an adjacent Pokemon this turn.

Pixilate.name: Pixilate
Pixilate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy type and have 1.3x power.

Plus.name: Plus
Plus.desc: If an active ally has this Ability or the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

Poison Heal.name: Poison Heal
Poison Heal.desc: This Pokemon is healed by 1/8 of its max HP each turn when poisoned; no HP loss.

Poison Point.name: Poison Point
Poison Point.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.

Poison Touch.name: Poison Touch
Poison Touch.desc: This Pokemon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning.

Prankster.name: Prankster
Prankster.desc: This Pokemon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by 1.

Pressure.name: Pressure
Pressure.desc: If this Pokemon is the target of a foe's move, that move loses one additional PP.

Primordial Sea.name: Primordial Sea
Primordial Sea.desc: On switch-in, heavy rain begins until this Ability is not active in battle.

Protean.name: Protean
Protean.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the move it is about to use.

Quick Feet.name: Quick Feet
Quick Feet.desc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Speed is 1.5x; ignores Speed drop from paralysis.

Rain Dish.name: Rain Dish
Rain Dish.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.

Rattled.name: Rattled
Rattled.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have 1.2x power; not Struggle.

Refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
Refrigerate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Ice type and have 1.3x power.

Regenerator.name: Regenerator
Regenerator.desc: This Pokemon restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it switches out.

Rivalry.name: Rivalry
Rivalry.desc: This Pokemon's attacks do 1.25x on same gender targets; 0.75x on opposite gender.

Rock Head.name: Rock Head
Rock Head.desc: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle/Life Orb/crash damage.

Rough Skin.name: Rough Skin
Rough Skin.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

Sand Force.name: Sand Force
Sand Force.desc: This Pokemon's Ground/Rock/Steel attacks do 1.3x in Sandstorm; immunity to it.

Sand Rush.name: Sand Rush
Sand Rush.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Sandstorm.

Sand Stream.name: Sand Stream
Sand Stream.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

Sand Veil.name: Sand Veil
Sand Veil.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.

Sap Sipper.name: Sap Sipper
Sap Sipper.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage if hit by a Grass move; Grass immunity.

Scrappy.name: Scrappy
Scrappy.desc: This Pokemon can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

Serene Grace.name: Serene Grace
Serene Grace.desc: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

Shadow Tag.name: Shadow Tag
Shadow Tag.desc: Prevents adjacent foes from choosing to switch unless they also have this Ability.

Shed Skin.name: Shed Skin
Shed Skin.desc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.

Sheer Force.name: Sheer Force
Sheer Force.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have 1.3x power; nullifies the effects.

Shell Armor.name: Shell Armor
Shell Armor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

Shield Dust.name: Shield Dust
Shield Dust.desc: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

Simple.name: Simple
Simple.desc: When one of this Pokemon's stat stages is raised or lowered, the amount is doubled.

Skill Link.name: Skill Link
Skill Link.desc: This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times.

Slow Start.name: Slow Start
Slow Start.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

Sniper.name: Sniper
Sniper.desc: If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.

Snow Cloak.name: Snow Cloak
Snow Cloak.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Hail.

Snow Warning.name: Snow Warning
Snow Warning.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Hail.

Solar Power.name: Solar Power
Solar Power.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.

Solid Rock.name: Solid Rock
Solid Rock.desc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

Soundproof.name: Soundproof
Soundproof.desc: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

Speed Boost.name: Speed Boost
Speed Boost.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.

Stall.name: Stall
Stall.desc: This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.

Stance Change.name: Stance Change
Stance Change.desc: If Aegislash, changes Forme to Blade before attacks and Shield before King's Shield.

Static.name: Static
Static.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.desc: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.desc: This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.

Sticky Hold.name: Sticky Hold
Sticky Hold.desc: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack.

Storm Drain.name: Storm Drain
Storm Drain.desc: This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.

Strong Jaw.name: Strong Jaw
Strong Jaw.desc: This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have 1.5x power. Bug Bite is not boosted.

Sturdy.name: Sturdy
Sturdy.desc: If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. Immune to OHKO.

Suction Cups.name: Suction Cups
Suction Cups.desc: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

Super Luck.name: Super Luck
Super Luck.desc: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.desc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Bug attacks.

Sweet Veil.name: Sweet Veil
Sweet Veil.desc: This Pokemon and its allies cannot fall asleep; those already asleep do not wake up.

Swift Swim.name: Swift Swim
Swift Swim.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

Symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis.desc: If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately.

Synchronize.name: Synchronize
Synchronize.desc: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.

Tangled Feet.name: Tangled Feet
Tangled Feet.desc: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.

Technician.name: Technician
Technician.desc: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power, including Struggle.

Telepathy.name: Telepathy
Telepathy.desc: This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.

Teravolt.name: Teravolt
Teravolt.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Thick Fat.name: Thick Fat
Thick Fat.desc: Fire-/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved offensive stat.

Tinted Lens.name: Tinted Lens
Tinted Lens.desc: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.

Torrent.name: Torrent
Torrent.desc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Water attacks.

Tough Claws.name: Tough Claws
Tough Claws.desc: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.

Toxic Boost.name: Toxic Boost
Toxic Boost.desc: While this Pokemon is poisoned, its physical attacks have 1.5x power.

Trace.name: Trace
Trace.desc: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

Truant.name: Truant
Truant.desc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

Turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
Turboblaze.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Unaware.name: Unaware
Unaware.desc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.

Unburden.name: Unburden
Unburden.desc: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.

Unnerve.name: Unnerve
Unnerve.desc: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.

Victory Star.name: Victory Star
Victory Star.desc: This Pokemon and its allies' moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.1.

Vital Spirit.name: Vital Spirit
Vital Spirit.desc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

Volt Absorb.name: Volt Absorb
Volt Absorb.desc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.

Water Absorb.name: Water Absorb
Water Absorb.desc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

Water Veil.name: Water Veil
Water Veil.desc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

Weak Armor.name: Weak Armor
Weak Armor.desc: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 1.

White Smoke.name: White Smoke
White Smoke.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

Wonder Guard.name: Wonder Guard
Wonder Guard.desc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.

Wonder Skin.name: Wonder Skin
Wonder Skin.desc: Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.

Zen Mode.name: Zen Mode
Zen Mode.desc: If Darmanitan, at end of turn changes Mode to Standard if > 1/2 max HP, else Zen.
